# scale

**Instance Property**

The scale factor of the image.

## Declaration

```swift
var scale: CGFloat { get }
```

## Discussion

If you load an image from a file whose name includes the `@2x` modifier, the scale is set to `2.0`. You can also specify an explicit scale factor when initializing an image from a Core Graphics image. All other images are assumed to have a scale factor of `1.0`.

If you multiply the logical size of the image (stored in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImage/size] property) by the value in this property, you get the dimensions of the image in pixels.

## Getting the image size and scale

- **size**: The logical dimensions, in points, for the image.
